description.value: A living will is a verbal or written description of the patientâ€™s wishes with regard to future medical action or end of their life. A living will is mainly used for situations in which the patient is no longer able to speak about these decisions with their healthcare provider.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-AdvanceDirective](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-AdvanceDirective) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
